entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text:
@BarbraStreisand @ashdmitch When it's over it will be undeniable that the 2016 election directly lead to at least 200k Americans dead from covid-19 and I'm thinking it's closer to 300-500k+.

It's difficult to argue that this administration & GOP did anything but help spread the virus.
